basics.name: Unnamed Chef
basics.label: Sous Chef
basics.summary: An eager, professional and committed Chef, passionate about great food and always maintaining my finger on the pulse of the heart of establishment. Committed in developing personal and culinary abilities to the fullest extent. Have vast long termed experience in cooking high quality breakfast, lunch, and evening meals, while driving food values forward. Seeking a suitable position with a company that offers a unique environment to work in along with career development opportunities.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Mentoring, training and supporting junior chefs. Prepared and cooked, nutritious and well balanced meals. Managed basic preparation of food together with Head Chef. Created dishes for patrons with special dietary or cultural needs.
highlights: Enhanced customer satisfaction level up to 60%

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: In charge of product and produce purchasing. Mentoring, training and supporting junior chefs, cooks and other back of the house personnel.
highlights: Responsible for maintaining and inspecting kitchen produce

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Menu sampling and setting recipe amendments for special events and catering alongside of Executive Chef. Order Synchronization and maintenance of inventory control ensuring cost and stock management.
highlights: Hospitality training and mentoring of new personnel

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assisted management in all manners of running and preserving integrity of the 'hot line'. Managed and maintained mise en place stations.
highlights: Responsible with assisting Executive Chef in creating daily specials and menus
Responsible for proper food preparation and running work station

skills.name: Culinary attributes
keywords: Mentoring, training and supporting junior chefs
Bringing creative and commercially viable new lines to the market
Management of meal preparations for special dietary or cultural needs
